title: 2 Camille E bugs/oversights - interaction with Veigar E and Cassiopeia W.
body:
I heard word that Camille can E right through a Veigar E Event Horizon and also use E while standing in Cassiopeia W Miasma.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/dxL8gv7u-as-someone-whos-love-for-veigar-knows-no-bounds

For some reason they don't seem to want to report it or think it's intentional, so here is my report instead.

replies.body:
her first E is a pull, so {{champion:69}} W doesnt affect it the second E is stopped by Cass W though.

Haven't seen {{champion:164}} E go through Event Horizon

Well in that case Thresh's Lantern is a pull, you cannot click it anyways when standing on cass's W... because it a mobility ability, Camille shouldnt E out of it with either her first cast nor her second E cast.
